entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
